Articles.Content:
Zokesian Interstellar K-drive Explorer

The Latest in Zokesian Technology. I present to the public, the Stock Zokesian Interstellar K-drive Explorer! It is the first of it's kind. Zokesia is the first company to make practical interstellar space craft!

Uses the latest in K-drive technology to propel it to the Stars! No cheats used! Can get to orbit on it's own (at about 4 MPS though).

K-drives use the collision of landing legs against other parts to accelerate indefinitely without fuel! May break alot.

Comes with a Science lab, Habitation module, 2 atmospheric probes, Large docking port, Tons of RCS and Liquid Fuel and 2 large solar panels.

Action groups

1=Ladders

2=Correction engines (These do use fuel).

G= K-Drive toggle (press twice at first launch).

Download: http://www./view/hm1prwz1dhkxhrn/Zokesian_Interstellar_K-drive_Explorer.craft

Kerbin Orbit (Used a lifter stage)

Kerbin Escape

High Kerbol Orbit

Long Live Zokesia!
Cool! Is it reliable? As my first spaceships equipped with K-drive destroyed themselves soon or later.
Fairly reliable. Quicksave just in case
